testcase.name: As a manager I want to sign in so I can view my custom homepage
testcase.classname: Users of my bug catcher application should be able to login to their respective homepages

testcase.name: As a tester I want to sign in so I can view my custom homepage
testcase.classname: Users of my bug catcher application should be able to login to their respective homepages

testcase.name: as the manager i want to name and assign a defect to a tester
testcase.classname: Managers of my bug catcher application should be able to create and assign defects
